mapper.sql: b.brand_id AS brandId, b.country, b.name, b.description, b.kind, b.image_path AS imagePath, b.score, b.create_by AS "createBy.userId", b.create_date AS createDate, b.update_by AS "updateBy.userId", b.update_date AS updateDate
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM brand b ORDER BY b.brand_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brand(country, name, description, kind, image_path, score, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES(#{country}, #{name}, #{description}, #{kind}, #{imagePath}, #{score}, #{createBy.userId}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.userId}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE brand SET country = #{country}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, kind = #{kind}, image_path = #{imagePath}, score = #{score}, update_by = #{updateBy.userId}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE brand_id = #{brandId}
